name: vocal-lab-app
description: A simple server to host the VocalLab static web application.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && node build.mjs && sed -e 's|dist/bundle\.js|/dist/bundle.js|g' -e 's|/index\.css|/dist/bundle.css|g' index.html > dist/index.html
scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p dist_prod && node build.mjs && mv dist/bundle.js dist_prod/bundle.js && mv dist/bundle.css dist_prod/bundle.css && sed -e 's|dist/bundle\.js|./bundle.js?v='$(date +%s)'|g' -e 's|/index\.css|./bundle.css|g' index.html > dist_prod/index.html && mkdir -p dist_prod/sounds && cp -r sounds/* dist_prod/sounds/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p dist_prod/visuals && cp -r visuals/* dist_prod/visuals/ 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist
